settings.title: Facials
settings.subtitle: Partouch 150
settings.text:
This facial is customizable to your skin type/concerns, delivering outstanding result

s. It helps to tighten pores, revitalize cells, diminish acne, brighten the skin, and give it a more youthful appearance/glow. Some of our specialty treatments would include Oxygen, Chemical Peels, Time Master Pro, the Hydrofacial, Microdermabrasion, Facial Infusion, LED, and Cryotherapy.
settings.text_2: Say Hello to healthy, vibrant, clear, lifted, luminous glowy skin. This facial is the answer to all your skin worries. It is completely customizable to your skin needs and delivers a glow like no other. Our specialty treatments from ParTouch can be done in this facial plus so much more. This facial was designed to give your skin the works, and take you to the next level. Other specialty treatments that can be used in your facial will include 24K Gold, Microcurrent, Stem Cell Infusion, Chemical Peels, and the Hydraneedle. This facial will also come with the added benefit (if the skin permits) of hot stones. The skin will be cleansed with hot stones, and they will also be used in the massage.
settings.text_3:
Come shop with us and get a skin care routine that's specifically catered to you. In this facial we will go over your skin concerns, and your daily life/activities to pick products that would fit best into your lifestyle. This facial was designed “With You In Mind”, and will include our Hydrofacial, and the products used will be ones that you are interested in buying. 

*If products purchased totals over the cost of the Facial, then the service is Complimentary.
settings.text_4: Let all your worries float away. This facial uses CBD to help with cellular turnover, and regulate sebum production. It contains powerful antioxidants that help with inflammation, improves the integrity of the skin, and provides total relaxation. This facial will start with a light back massage with hot stones to help aid in the relaxation. This facial will include a CBD tincture or gummy, double cleanse, exfoliation, CBD/Oxygen Infusion, CBD mask, Time Master Pro, and hot stones.
settings.text_5: Micro-needling generates new collagen and skin tissue for smoother, firmer, and more toned skin. It will help with deep pitted acne scars, discoloration, fine lines, and wrinkles. This service allows for 90% more penetration of topicals. We use a closed patented cartridge that's composed of 100% medical grade components that won't lead to any tearing or scratching. There will be little to no discomfort during the service. This treatment will include a double cleansing of the skin, light microdermabrasion, 2nd custom exfoliation, LED, microneedling, cryo globes to calm the skin, cooling custom mask, and a light massage.

settings.title: Facials Enhancements
settings.subtitle: Microcurrent 80
settings.text: Microcurrent re-educates facial muscles, stimulates ATP(cell fuel) to help lift, firm, tone, brighten, detoxify, and oxygenate the skin. Results are cumulative.
settings.text_2: Get the red carpet glow. A special cocktail blend will be specially made for your skin type and concerns. The hydra needle will infuse powerful antioxidants into the skin to help with pores, revitalization, tone, and to provide a glow you have never seen before. Want the treatment by itself, inquire within.
settings.text_3: This is the perfect add on to any treatment. Adding heat to the body helps with relaxation and for the mind and body to be in a state of peace. Hot stones help to release tension in the body that can cause stiffness and pain.
settings.text_4: This treatment will be delivered through microchanneling, and there will be no downtime. This treatment uses Stem Growth Factors and cytokines derived from bone marrow stem cells to replenish and recharge your skin's energy while either clarifying, brightening, or addressing specific anti aging skin concerns.
settings.text_5:
Professional Grade Low Frequency Ultrasound with LED for skin tightening and wrinkle smoothing from the plumping effect of Ultrasound vibrating at 90,000 waves per second to activate skin metabolism and regenerate skin cells. Output is the same frequency as a laser device but the energy is low so it does not damage the skin like the heat from a laser. This will strengthen/lift the skin, give a youthful appearance, increase oxygen to the cells and remove wastes in the pores. 
*Results are cumulative. This treatment can be done at home, inquire within to purchase your own.

settings.title: Light Wave LED Therapy
settings.subtitle: LED Light Therapy Program
settings.text: LIGHTWAVE'S patented Red, Infrared & Blue Light therapy can dramatically revitalize your skin without any downtime or discomfort. This innovative aesthetic treatment helps counteract years of sun damage, environmental damage, aging, acne and acne scarring. LIGHTWAVE provides noticeable results, often in a few sessions.
settings.text_2: Get the results you want, and take your skin to the next level. Topical Light Infusion is proprietary technology combining LED light therapy and powerful topicals that dramatically diminishes the fine lines and wrinkles, discoloration and inflammation while improving the overall appearance of the skin. Choose from Wrinkle Repair, Collagen Renewal, Brightening Treatment, Blemish and oil control treatment, Resveratrol Illuminating Complex Booster Mask, Plumping Hydration Boosting Gel Mask, Pro Power C, Ceramide Boosting Mask, and the Retinol Treatment. This treatment will include a deep cleansing of the skin, and exfoliation.
